TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TaxonomySiteMapNode extends System.Web.SiteMapNode
Public NotInheritable Class TaxonomySiteMapNode Inherits SiteMapNode
public ref class TaxonomySiteMapNode sealed : System::Web::SiteMapNode

Docs.summary: Represents a navigation node that is obtained by a object.

remarks.para: This class is part of the managed navigation feature. It adapts a property or a property to act as a node in the site map that is used the ASP.NET navigation menu controls.
The SiteMapNode subclass is a wrapper for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Description { get; set; }
.property instance string Description
Public Overrides Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the description of the navigation item.
Docs.value: The description of the navigation item

remarks.para: The property, which is retrieved from the property, typically is used to display hover text for menu items.

public bool IsTermSet { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property IsTermSet As Boolean
public: property bool IsTermSet { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a Boolean value that returns true if a object is bound to a object, that is, the root of the tree.
Docs.value: true if the TaxonomySiteMapNode object is bound to a NavigationTermSet object; otherwise, false

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.Navigation.NavigationTerm NavigationTerm { get; }
.property instance class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.Navigation.NavigationTerm NavigationTerm
Public ReadOnly Property NavigationTerm As NavigationTerm
public: property Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::Navigation::NavigationTerm ^ NavigationTerm { Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::Navigation::NavigationTerm ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a object that the current object represents, or null if the object is a object.
Docs.value: If the object is a NavigationTerm, then the NavigationTerm object; otherwise, a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic)

remarks.para: When a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) is returned, the object is a NavigationTermSet.

remarks.para: The property is retrieved from the method.
